message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
You can have less, I'll take more!
Meet me in the middle, I'll give you a bit more!
I'll take the majority, you can have a bit!
I'm willing to give you more, but not that much more!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
Last chance, meet me at this price or walk away!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
This is my last stand, take it or leave it!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking control!
This is my final offer, take it or we both walk away with nothing!
I'll take it all, you got nothing!
